thread.section_title: TinyDeal 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 TinyDeal 的点评意见 | www.tinydeal.com
thread.title: ted wood
thread.title_full: TinyDeal 的点评人 ted wood

author: ted wood
title: ted wood
text: I think they are selling junk stuff then will claim ignorance. I got a smartphone that had screen defects and will not charge on arrival. They try to get you to accept a part refund or spend tons of money returning their stuff when they should not have even bothered to send because it was not working. I DO NOT TRUST THEM OR BELIEVE THEIR REPLIES
